Food Store Cashier job - PRINCE ALBERT - Bulk Barn Foods
Food Store Cashier (Expired) Bulk Barn Foods PRINCE ALBERT Employer Name: Bulk Barn Foods Posted Date: 02/08/2012 Location: PRINCE ALBERT # of Positions: 1 Employment Terms: Part Time Education: Completed at least some secondary school Experience: 7-11 Months Apply By: 03/07/2012 How to Apply?: Email Description Provide superior customer service. - Process sales accurately and efficiently. - Solid product knowledge. - Maintain a clean and organized environment. - Part time positions available - Evening and week-end availability is required. Skills and Abilities Security and Safety - Bondable Work Setting - Wholesale establishment Essential Skills - Significant use of memory - Continuous learning - Computer use - Decision making - Problem solving - Working with others - Oral communication - Numeracy - Reading text Work Conditions and Physical Capabilities - Standing for extended periods - Attention to detail - Fast-paced environment Specific Skills - Weigh produce and bulk foods - Wrap or place merchandise in bags - Enter prices of items on cash register - Greet customers - Receive payment for goods or services - Scan items - Process money, cheques and credit/debit card payments - Customer service oriented - Operate cash register Business E.... Found at Saskjobs.ca on 2012-02-08 19:39:10
